sentences.sentence: Of those calm solitudes is there.
sentences.translation: 风平浪静地在那里独居良久。

sentences.sentence: Africa is going at last to give up the secret of its vast solitudes.
sentences.translation: 非洲无边无际的荒野的秘密就要被揭穿了。

sentences.sentence: The scientist has spent six months in the solitudes of the Antarctic.
sentences.translation: 这位科学家已经在人迹罕至的南极待了六个月了。
